name: Taco Fred Must Survive
description:
Taco Fred must survive -  a top down  shooter, about a little Taco who has to survive waves of zombies! with his trusty hot sauce bottle on him, he must survive, or he will be eaten.

move  with arrow keys

shoot with mouse

Game was created by Alberto Zapata who did the: Code, Art, Game Design, Music

you can follow me on twitter @GhostBitStudios
